name: unstated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not said or written, but thought or known: unstated assumption The work is based on a series of unstated assumptions that have never been challenged. unstated premise The unstated premise was political pluralism. There has been a view, stated or unstated, that such behaviour is unacceptable. Related word
state verb formal
More examplesFewer examplesMisunderstandings can often be caused by unstated assumptions. The unstated aim is to isolate dissenters.It is possible that there are unstated military aims.They have one simple goal, albeit unstated: to minimize risk and maximize profits. These were the categories for marital status: single; married; separated, widowed, or divorced; and unstated.
